IClipboardOnPrimaryClipChangedListener Class Reference

Defines a listener callback that is invoked when the primary clip on the clipboard changes. More...

#include <IClipboardOnPrimaryClipChangedListener.h>

Detailed Description

Defines a listener callback that is invoked when the primary clip on the clipboard changes. 

  class ClipboardTestListener : public gaia::content::IClipboardOnPrimaryClipChangedListener {
    public:
    explicit ClipboardTestListener();
    virtual ~ClipboardTestListener();
    void onPrimaryClipChanged();
  };

  ClipboardTestListener* mpListener = new ClipboardTestListener();
  mpClipboardMgr->registerOnPrimaryClipChangedListener(mpListener);
